synopsis.text: After being discarded in the desolate wasteland known as the Scrapyard, the remnants of a female cyborg are discovered by Doc Ido, a skilled doctor and mechanic. With great care, Ido revives and rebuilds the cyborg, naming her Gally. Despite her amnesia and newfound lethal abilities, Gally embarks on a journey to find her place in a harsh world where survival is a constant battle. As she forges her own path, Gally becomes a formidable bounty hunter, taking on the most dangerous criminals in Scrap Iron City while striving to uncover her own mysterious past. Adapted from the first two volumes of the 'Battle Angel Alita' manga, this gripping tale explores the essence of humanity and the power of love in a post-apocalyptic world overshadowed by the floating utopia of Zalem.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
